questions.explanation:
Flora.

	Floss, Flossie or Flora is the main character of the book. Her parents are divorced and when her mum goes to Australia she decides to live with her dad. But when her dad loses the shop... Floss's life is completely changed.

questions.text: Who is Rhiannon's best friend after she dumps Floss?
options: She begs Floss to be her friend
questions.explanation:
Margot.

	She pals up with Margot ever since she finds out that Floss is living with her dad. At first, she's nice to Floss because her mum wants her to be but when Floss leaves Rhiannon for Susan she becomes best friends with Margot.

questions.text: Is Floss a blonde throughout the whole book?
questions.explanation:
no.

	In the end of the book, Floss dyes her hair pink. There's also a picture.

questions.text: In the last picture of the book who is the girl with long red hair who's buying Candyfloss?
questions.explanation:
Charlotte & Charlie.

	There are also two other units. The middle one is a picture of Floss with pink hair. On the top is a Chip Butty stall which Floss's dad runs. On the bottom is Rose's Candyfloss stall. Funny-Face and Simple Simon from 'The bed and breakfast star' are there, Ruby and Garnet from 'Double Act' and Lisa and Angela, Charlie's best friends are there from the 'Lottie Project.'

questions.text: Who is not a character in 'Candyfloss'?
questions.explanation:
India.

	Lisa, Elsa and Simon are all there in the last picture. India is from 'Secrets' and does not appear.

black.

	According to Floss, Rhiannon is the prettiest girl in the whole school.

questions.text: In Floss's list of birthday presents, which is number 3?

a pink pull along trolley suitcase
a pink shoebox containing a pair of trainers blue with pink laces
questions.explanation:
a little wallet of gel pens with a stationery set and stickers.

	Floss made a list of all her birthday presents.

questions.text: In Floss's ballad what did she want to write in the last line 'In her new life Down Under'?
questions.explanation:
In Australia & Australia.

	Floss's ballad is'The girl sat in an aeroplaneWatching the clouds with wonder,Worrying how she'd get onIn her new life Down Under.'

Charlie.

	Tiger is Steve's son. Steve is Floss's stepdad. In Charlie's shop the 'C' was missing and it was read as 'Harlie'.

questions.text: When Floss and Susan were packing, how many not too bad items were there?
questions.explanation:
20.

	20 clothes were not too bad. 12 items were good. 14 is just a number I thought of. 52 and a half items were items to chuck out.
